title: How to Use This Catalogue
publication_title: The Modern Series at the Art Institute of Chicago
content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section body" id="body">This catalogue documents the exhibition Shatter Rupture Break, held at the Art Institute of Chicago from February 15 to May 3, 2015. The publication features illustrations of works from the checklist, exhibition texts, and photographs of the installation, as well as a compilation of visitor reactions and transcriptions and videos of conversations held in the galleries with curators and scholars.

The Modern Series: Shatter Rupture Break was produced by the Art Institute of Chicago and built using the OSCI Toolkit, an open-source, digital-publishing platform. The publication features interactive elements and a modular design.

For more information regarding the navigation of this publication, please see the instructional images below.

Tools and Navigation Interactive Wall </section><section epub:type="footnotes" id="footnotes"></section><section id="figures"> Tools and Navigation Interactive Wall </section>
